headlines.description: Zavier Simpson was a catalyst on both ends of the floor, running Michigan's efficient offense and leading its lock-down defense, and back-up big man Jon Teske scored 14 as the 15th-ranked Wolverines beat No. 8 Purdue 75-66 Sunday to repeat as Big Ten...
headlines.shortLinkText: Michigan beats Purdue to win 2nd straight Big Ten Tournament

video.headline: Michigan wins back-to-back Big Ten titles

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Michigan wins back-to-back Big Ten titles) 2018/03/04 ESHEET

headlines.description: Jacob Evans scored 19 points to lead No. 10 Cincinnati to a 62-61 victory over No. 11 Wichita State on Sunday, giving the Bearcats the American Athletic Conference title.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 10 Cincinnati outlasts No. 11 Wichita State 62-61

video.headline: Cincinnati clinches AAC crown over Wichita State

headlines.description: Rob Gray scored 30 points, Corey Davis Jr. had 17 and No. 25 Houston held off UConn 81-71 on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rob Gray, No. 25 Houston hold off UConn 81-71

headlines.description: Joe Chealey scored 22 points and top-seeded Charleston defeated No. 8 seed Drexel 66-59 on Sunday to advance to the Colonial Athletic Association Tournament semifinals.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chealey scores 22, sparks Charleston in CAA quarterfinals

headlines.description: Will Rayman scored 22 points and No. 2 seed Colgate defeated No. 6 Holy Cross 62-55 on Sunday to advance to the Patriot League championship game for the first time since 2007-08.
headlines.shortLinkText: Colgate advances to title game for first time since 2007-08

headlines.description: Carlik Jones made a long 3-pointer at the buzzer and Radford beat Liberty 55-52 on Sunday in the Big South Conference championship, earning the Highlanders their first NCAA tournament berth since 2009.
headlines.shortLinkText: Buzzer-beater sends Radford to NCAA tourney

headlines.description: David Collins scored 21 points and Malik Martin scored 15 and South Florida ended the regular season with a 65-54 win over SMU on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: S. Florida downs slumping SMU 65-54 in American finale

headlines.description: Stephen Brown scored 19 of his 26 points in the first half and regular-season champion Bucknell cruised into the championship game of the Patriot League Tournament with a 90-59 win over fifth-seeded Boston University on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brown's 26 carry Bucknell past BU 90-59 in Patriot semi

headlines.description: David Cohn scored 24 points, Nathan Knight had a double-double and No. 4 seed William & Mary defeated fifth-seeded Towson for the first time in three meetings this season, 80-66, on Sunday to advance to the semifinals of the Colonial Athletic...
headlines.shortLinkText: Cohn, Knight help William & Mary advance past Towson 80-66

headlines.description: Corey Henderson Jr., scored 21 points and Martins Igbanu scored 16 and Tulsa used an early run to beat Temple 76-58 on Sunday in a regular-season finale.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tulsa uses early blitz then holds off Temple 76-58

headlines.description: Kareem Brewton Jr. scored a career-high 22 points, Mike Parks Jr. added 20 and Memphis beat East Carolina 90-70 on Sunday in a regular-season finale that secured the fifth seed for the Tigers in the American Athletic Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Memphis beats ECU to secure 5th seed for conference tourney

headlines.description: Lipscomb is headed to the NCAA tournament for the first time, after Garrison Mathews scored 33 points and the second-seeded Bisons wasted most of an enormous lead before recovering to beat top-seeded Florida Gulf Coast 108-96.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lipscomb downs FGCU, claims 1st NCAA berth

video.headline: Lipscomb holds on to clinch school's 1st tournament bid

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCB Highlight (Lipscomb holds on to clinch school's 1st tournament bid) 2018/03/04 esheet

headlines.description: Francis Alonso's 3-pointer with 19.2 seconds remaining lifted top-seeded UNC Greensboro to a 56-55 win over No. 5 seed Wofford on Sunday and into the Southern Conference Tournament championship game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alonso's 3-pointer gives UNCG berth in SoCon title game

headlines.description: B.J. Taylor scored 19 points, Dayon Griffin scored 13 and UCF beat Tulane 60-51 on Sunday in an American Athletic Conference finale.
headlines.shortLinkText: UCF locks sixth seed to tourney with 60-51 win over Tulane

headlines.description: Brock Stull scored 25 points, Brett Prahl scored 14 and sixth-seeded Milwaukee defeated No. 3 seed Illinois-Chicago 80-75 in a Horizon League Tournament quarterfinal game Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Milwaukee moves on beating UIC 80-75 in Horizon quarterfinal

notes.headline: LITTLE CAESARS HORIZON LEAGUE MEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP - QUARTERFINAL

headlines.description: Vasa Pusica scored 15 points, had 10 assists and grabbed eight rebounds and No. 2 seed Northeastern defeated seventh-seeded Delaware 74-50 in a Colonial Athletic Association Tournament quarterfinal Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Northeastern throttles Delaware 74-50 to advance to semis

headlines.description: Desonta Bradford had 20 points and eight rebounds and freshman Mladen Armus had his first double-double to help East Tennessee State beat Furman 63-52 on Sunday night in the Southern Conference Tournament semifinals.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bradford, ETSU beat Furman, advance to SoCon tourney finals

headlines.description: Schadrac Casimir scored 16 of his 24 points in the second half and his steal in the closing seconds sealed Iona's comeback 65-62 win over Saint Peter's on Sunday night in the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Casimir, Iona rally to beat Saint Peter's in MAAC Tournament

headlines.description: Paul Miller scored 18 of his 29 points in the second half to help North Dakota State hold on for an 86-82 win over Fort Wayne on Sunday night in the first round of the Summit League Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Miller, NDSU hold off Fort Wayne, advance in Summit tourney

headlines.description: Horizon League player of the year Kendrick Nunn scored 18 points and short-handed Oakland beat IUPUI 62-55 on Sunday night in the quarterfinals of the league tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nunn hits late FTs, Oakland advances to Horizon League semis

notes.headline: LITTLE CAESARS HORIZON LEAGUE MEN'S CHAMPIONSHIP - QUARTERFINAL

headlines.description: Jordon Talley hit five 3-pointers and tied the Colonial Athletic Association Tournament record with a career-high 37 points to help UNC Wilmington beat Hofstra 93-88 on Sunday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Talley scores 37, UNCW beats Hofstra in CAA tourney

headlines.description: Ferron Flavors Jr. had 21 points and 11 rebounds and Tyler Nelson scored 19 points to help Fairfield beat Quinnipiac 74-64 on Sunday night in the semifinals of the Metro Atlantic Athletic Conference Tournament.
headlines.shortLinkText: Flavors, Fairfield beat Quinnipiac, advance in MAAC tourney

headlines.description: Joe Rosga banked in an off-balance 3-pointer with 3.2 seconds left in regulation and Denver held off Oral Roberts for a 90-88 victory on Sunday night in the second double-overtime game in Summit League Tournament history.
headlines.shortLinkText: Denver wins in Summit League tourney's 2nd two-overtime game

headlines.description: Donte Ingram scored 18 points, Cameron Krutwig added 11 points and nine rebounds, and Loyola-Chicago earned its first NCAA tournament appearance in 33 years with a 65-49 victory over Illinois State on Sunday in the MVC championship game.
headlines.shortLinkText: Loyola makes tourney for 1st time in 33 years

nowFeed.headline: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.
nowFeed.story: This is going to be a rough wait until Selection Sunday for Saint Mary's. Their at-large resume is basically one win at Gonzaga, a gaudy record (including a great record away from home) and very solid predictive/quality metrics.

nowFeed.headline:
Arkansas senior Dustin Thomas has been dismissed from the team, effective immediately, for a violation of team rules. 

Has played at least 18 minutes in 12 of the Razorbacks' last 15 games.
nowFeed.story:

nowFeed.headline: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.
nowFeed.story: After a couple of upsets en route to its Big Ten title, Michigan has jumped up to 14th in BPI's latest rankings. Florida also a big mover in the last week.

nowFeed.headline: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."
nowFeed.story: John Beilein said several teams that made deep March runs have had this type of long layoff in the past  and winning a title game at Madison Square Garden balances it out. "To play in front of that crowd, that's a once in a lifetime experience. It's worth the wait."

nowFeed.headline: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.
nowFeed.story: There might not be a hotter team nationally right now than Michigan. Nine straight wins for the Wolverines, back-to-back Big Ten tournament titles.

nowFeed.headline: Nojel Eastern has had some moments this week for Purdue. Has been very good defensively, his size causing some problems for Tony Carr yesterday, being used on Zavier Simpson today. Also has six points today.

Michigan's Jon Teske has 12 points in 10 minutes so far today. 

In Michigan's last 11 games, Jon Teske had scored a combined 19 points.

nowFeed.headline: Battle of the big men so far here at Madison Square Garden. Isaac Haas has all seven points for Purdue; Moe Wagner and Jon Teske combining for all nine for Michigan.

nowFeed.headline:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.
nowFeed.story:
I followed Grayson Allen closely since his high school days. A fierce  competitor who gave it his all. He never had one issue on or off the court. I called Duke's game last year when Grayson Allen had his tripping incident. Tonight on senior night in a win over North Carolina I loved listening to Maria Taylor's post-game interview with Allen. 
What does Duke mean to you? 
" It means everything to me, it's my love and my passion. " Allen said. 
I call that growing up.

nowFeed.headline: When asked to put into words the week that was, Arizona Head Coach Sean Miller used "devastating" and "remarkable."  U of A clinched the PAC-12 regular season title with a 66-54 victory over California.

nowFeed.headline: Duke trails by 3, but it's been a night of missed opportunities - and shots - for the Blue Devils. They are 1-8 from behind the arc, including this shot, which feel about six inches short.
